* Biomass was nearing the area where Nue'e and himself were supposed to be 
stationed, as so went the One's orders.
One of his great black eyes looks back towards the ship though, noticing a 
rather large great white shark depart from it. He sighs, bubbles appearing 
from between his tenticles.*

" I think I'm going to have trouble with that boy."

* Nue'e looks at him and rears her head.*

" Stratus?" She chuckled. " There's always one of those."

* Biomass chuckled as he suddenly changed course and jetted towards the 
surface, wondering just what it would be like above the water.
And the sunwas blinding once he did break the surface, surprised at the 
sound of the water as his giant mass came above.
He squinted, not even noticing Nue'e come up beside him until one of his 
tenticles nearly fell ontop of her and she gace a little shreek.
The sun was...so blinding!*



* Sublime had waved back to Crater before he slipped into the next room, 
wondering if she would ever see any of the crew again but deciding to worry 
about it later.
After eating her fill she slipped out of the ship in jellyfish mode, working 
her way gracefully towards her destination.
The Maximals base.*
